frontmatter.title: How far can I go to provide free apps?
frontmatter.description: My life with development started at 2001, when I was learning HTML, Javascript and Photoshop. But for me, with 13 years old it was pointless having the knowledge and not using it. Then I started creating websites for everything. My first was called "It is good HP" had aeroplane pictures and jokes. Then I created uncountable others for my friends. And I never charged one single penny for any of them.

frontmatter.title: How did I get and apartment in Dublin using JS?
frontmatter.description: After two years living in Co. Kerry, Ireland my wife Kamila and I decided it was time to move. We were missing some opportunities, so we decided to go to Dublin. Subsequently, when I got the job I was looking for was when the tough part came. Finding an apartment to rent.
